article_title: Irish PM pushes Biden for immediate Gaza ceasefire
sentence: Ahead  of  the  summit  Mr  Varadkar  had  faced  significant  pressure  from  opposition  parties  in  Ireland  to  raise  the  ongoing  conflict  in  Gaza,  where  over  30,000  people  have  now  been  killed,  according  to  the  Hamas  run  health  ministry.
